Syntax_MLRS:
<color=#4BF0FF>MLRS Commands:</color>
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfire map</color> => MLRS will start to attack the marked spot on the map.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfire map</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => MLRS will start to attack the marked spot on the map with the entered amount of rockets.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfire p {playername}</color> => MLRS will start to attack the target players spot.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfire p {playername}</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => MLRS will start to attack the target players spot with the entered amount of rockets.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfireall map</color> => All found MLRS start to attack the marked spot on the map.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfireall map</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => All found MLRS on this server start to attack the marked spot on the map with the entered amount of rockets.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfireall p {playername}</color> => All found MLRS will start to attack the target players spot.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfireall p {playername}</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => All found MLRS will start to attack the target players spot with the entered amount of rockets.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfix</color> => Repears the active MLRS on the server.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrsfixall</color> => Repears all found MLRS on the server.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrs enable</color> => Allows all players to use MLRS like in vanilla rust.
<color=#D97E29>/mlrs disable</color> => Prevent all players to mount/use the MLRS on the server (can be bypassed with perm).
<color=#D97E29>/mlrs status</color> => Shows you if MLRS is enabled or disabled on this server.
Syntax_HellFire:
<color=#4BF0FF>HellFire Commands:</color>
<color=#D97E29>/hellfire p {playername}</color> => MLRS rocket spawns and start to attack the target players spot.
<color=#D97E29>/hellfire p {playername}</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => x MLRS rockets spawning and start to attack the target players spot.
<color=#D97E29>/hellfire map</color> => MLRS Rocket spawns and start to attack the marked spot on the map.
<color=#D97E29>/hellfire map</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => x MLRS Rocket spawning and start to attack the marked spot on the map.
Syntax_RemoteMLRS:
<color=#4BF0FF>RemoteMLRS Commands:</color>
<color=#FFED47>Info:</color> You need MLRS Rockets to call a remote MLRS attack.
<color=#D97E29>/remotemlrs p {playername}</color> => Calls MLRS attack to target players spot. Takes up to 12 MLRS rockets. (need extra perms)
<color=#D97E29>/remotemlrs p {playername}</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => MLRS will start to attack the target players spot. Takes x (max 12) MLRS rockets (need extra perms)
<color=#D97E29>/remotemlrs map</color> => MLRS will start to attack the marked spot on the map. Takes up to 12 MLRS rockets.
<color=#D97E29>/remotemlrs map</color> <color=#2990D9>(amount)</color> => MLRS will start to attack the marked spot on the map. Takes x (max 12) MLRS rockets.
